text: Sanjaya Joseph Malakar (; ; born September 10, 1989) is an American singer. He is best known for being on the sixth season of American Idol. He was not well liked by the program's judges, mainly Simon Cowell. He was voted off after the top 7 participants. ==References== Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Washington (state) Category:American Idol contestants
title: Sanjaya Malakar
